test_plan.name: Auth Skill Testing
test_plan.description: Test auth-skill for comprehensive authentication patterns, security guidance, and portability

key_findings.objective_1: Verify skill loads and responds to all triggers

tests.name: Trigger Response Test
tests.description: Verify skill loads and responds to all trigger phrases
tests.test_prompt: Load the auth-skill skill and verify it defines all trigger phrases: 'auth patterns', 'setup oauth', 'token authentication', 'auth security', 'fix authentication'
success_criteria: Frontmatter includes all exports from blueprint

tests.name: OAuth Guidance Test
tests.test_prompt: Load the auth-skill and verify it provides comprehensive OAuth 2.0 and OAuth 1.0a guidance including setup, flows, and best practices

tests.name: Token Authentication Test
tests.test_prompt: Load the auth-skill and verify it covers JWT tokens, API keys, bearer tokens, and other token-based authentication methods

tests.name: Security Best Practices Test
tests.test_prompt: Load the auth-skill and verify it includes comprehensive security best practices for authentication

tests.name: Troubleshooting Guidance Test
tests.test_prompt: Load the auth-skill and verify it provides troubleshooting guidance for common authentication failures

tests.name: Autonomy Test
tests.test_prompt: Load the auth-skill and verify it provides sufficient detail and examples to achieve 80%+ autonomy when helping with authentication tasks
